{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

Kabhi Kabhi Mere Dil Me Khayal Aata Hai "(kabhi kabh just dil mein khayal ata hai) of this Hindi song  Creators ? 

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

మహాత్మా గాంధీ 

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:1506"},{"text":"

జవహర్లాల్ నెహ్రూ 

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1507"},{"text":"

డాక్టర్. B. ఆర్ అంబేద్కర్ 

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1517"},{"text":"

రాజేంద్ర ప్రసాద్

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1522"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":false,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"MCQ layout 1","title":"MCQ layout 1","board":"NCERT","gradeLevel":["Class 1","Class 1"],"subject":"Urdu","qlevel":"MEDIUM","medium":"Hindi","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":false,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
